response.answer_text: Alexandra Cooper is a popular podcaster and Instagram model who more recently has been working with Barstool Sports. She hosts a podcast alongside Sofia Franklyn titled ‘Call Her Daddy’. To learn more about Cooper, check out her wiki page.  You may have also seen her on the jumbotron when she was dating MLB New York Mets player Noah Syndergaard. (That came to an end in 2017 though.) Alexandra Cooper also has a Youtube Channel where she publishes tutorials and funny videos such as this one:  Over the years she has amassed a large following!
